title: Patching problem

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I start patching and everything goes feel for 10 min, then I need to download the same thing I just downloaded, so If update is 600mb, I download 200 mb of it, then it goes back to 600mb, then I wait and I get the error "Update Failed" and I need to  retry. And then cycle repeats. Help? ps. Sorry for bad English

replies.body: The screenshot is good, but not showing exactly what I need to help.  At what percent exactly are you getting the error?

If the errors are happening after 30% then that could signify a connection problem reaching the patching servers.  You should go over the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!

Since riot doesn't want to help and keeps saying go to connections issue every time and it's obviously not doing anything. I just changed my DNS manually to 8.8.8.8 and it worked. It's not working cause your dns might be blocking the thing. If it doesn't work a vpn works as well. Hot spot shield has a free 1 day ELITE trial when u sign up. If the game doesn't work without the vpn then u have to change the DNS manually
